selected.name: Signature
selected.description: A signature guarantees that your parcel has been received by the recipient's household or neighbour.
selected.info: To comply with social distancing guidelines, couriers will not hand over a hand held device for signature, but will instead sign on the recipients behalf in their presence.

selected.name: Cover
selected.description: In the event of loss or damage of items we can compensate you up to the value of ?300.
selected.info: We will send your parcel that is worth ?987, however, parcel cover will only cover the first ?300.
